snippet: Abdul Fattah el-Sisi, the former general who led the military takeover of Egypt, declared there would be no reconciliation with the Muslim Brotherhood if he wins next month’s presidential election.
abstract: Former Egyptian general Abdel Fattah el-Sisi vows to eliminate the Muslim Brotherhood, Islamist group that dominated previous elections in the country; Sisi is expected to become Egypt's next president in June.
lead_paragraph: Abdul Fattah el-Sisi, the former general who led the military takeover of Egypt, declared there would be no reconciliation with the Muslim Brotherhood if he wins next month’s presidential election.

headline.main: Ex-General Vows to End Brotherhood if Elected
headline.print_headline: Ex-General Vows to End Brotherhood if Elected
